name: Stand[by] EP (CD)
description:
Josh's most recent recording,  Stand[by] features 6 original songs recorded July 2010 in Nashville, TN.  Produced by Jeremy Casella, this work gets to the heart of Josh as an artist.  Stand[by] focuses on the tension between truth and waiting.  This album features the talents of Gabe Scott (Andrew Peterson, Bebo Norman),  percussionist Ken Lewis, Shawn Skinner, Matt Pierson and Jeremy Casella. 

Track Listing:

1.  Take Me Away

2.  Psalm 117

3.  Be Still

4.  Hymn

5.  Tonight

6.  Hold On [bonus track] 

** 25% of the proceeds go to impact those in extreme poverty via One Day's Wages [www.onedayswages.org]
